sentences.sContent: An overall theme will help to give your essay coherence.
sentences.sCn: 一个总的主题将有助于使文章连贯紧凑。

sentences.sContent: He had a coherence of outlook and thought.
sentences.sCn: 他的观点和想法条理清晰。

phrases.pCn: 相位相干性；相位同调性

words.tran: 连贯的，一致的；明了的；清晰的；凝聚性的；互相偶合的；粘在一起的
连贯地；前后一致地；条理清楚地；互相偶合地；凝聚性地
凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力

trans.tranOther: when something such as a piece of writing is easy to understand because its parts are connected in a clear and reasonable way
